net.tfobz.vocabletrainer.data

Class VocableTrainerRunSettings

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.tfobz.vocabletrainer.data.VocableTrainerRunSettings

  • public class VocableTrainerRunSettings
extends java.lang.Object
    This class manages the settings for running a session of the Vocable Trainer. It allows customization of time limits, card limits, and other session parameters.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  VocableTrainerRunSettings.TimeUnit
      Enumeration representing the time unit options for setting limits.

                                 Lernkartei lernkartei)
        Constructs a VocableTrainerRunSettings object with the given Fach and Lernkartei.
        Parameters:
        fach - the box representing the Fach
        lernkartei - the set of flashcards
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if either fach or lernkartei is null

      • setCardTimeLimit

        public void setCardTimeLimit(int cardTimeLimit,
                             VocableTrainerRunSettings.TimeUnit unit)
        Sets the time limit for each card in the session.
        Parameters:
        cardTimeLimit - the time limit value
        unit - the unit of time for the limit (Seconds, Minutes, or Hours)
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the time limit is less than 1
